meta.title: BCH Gifts  | Bitcoin.com
meta.description: Create trackable cash gifts in your local currency with Bitcoin Cash (BCH)

header.title: Bitcoin.com Gifts
header.description: Create and manage Bitcoin Cash (BCH) gifts. Unredeemed gifts are automatically returned!

strings.seedReminderAbove: Save this 12-word seed to access your gifts in the future
strings.seedReminderBelow: Bitcoin.com never has access to your seed and we cannot help you if you lose it!
strings.seedWarning: Bitcoin.com never has access to your seed and we cannot help you if you lose it!
strings.inputExtra: If no refund address is provided, unclaimed tips will be donated to Bitcoin.com to help promote peer to peer electronic cash.
strings.sweepInstructions: Bitcoin.com never has access to your seed and we cannot help you if you lose it! You can send all the BCH from your unclaimed gifts to a single address in one transaction.
